verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
How can I say thanks
for the things
You have done for me?

Things so undeserved,
yet You gave
to prove Your love for me.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The voices
of a million angels
could not express
my gratitude;

All that I am
and ever hope to be,
I owe it all to Thee.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: for the things He has done.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
With His blood
He has saved me;

With His pow'r
He has raised me.

To God be the glory
for the things He has done

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
and should I gain
any praise,
let it go to Calvary.

verse.name: c2a
verse.lines:
With His blood
He has saved me;

With His pow'r
He has raised me.

To God be the glory
for the things He has done

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines:
For the things,
for the things,

for the things
He has done!
